text: @realDonaldTrump You’re a Frickn Jackass!  Governor Cuomo has done a remarkable job!  Unlike you Mr. President!  Remember you think Coronavirus is a Democratic Hoax?  That’s why you did nothing back in January and got thousands of Americans killed! 😏 So shut up 🤐
